name: adobe-to-mixpanel
description: ETL from adbobe omniture to mixpanel

scripts.dev: npm run prune && RUNTIME=dev nodemon --max-old-space-size=16096 --ignore tmp/ --ignore fake/ --ignore sampleData/ --inspect scratch.mjs | bunyan -o short
scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy adobe-transform --gen2 --no-allow-unauthenticated  --env-vars-file .env.yaml --runtime nodejs16 --region us-central1 --trigger-http --memory 16GB --entry-point start --source . --timeout=3600 --max-instances=3355 --min-instances=0

author: AK
